name: pt_stationarypoint_conc
description: All facilities in the POINT data category that have geographic coordinates other than those with facility type = 100 (which are in the"Airport" source group) or facility type = 151 (which are in the "Railyard" source group).

name: or_lightduty_offnetwork_gas_conc
description: On-road, light duty, nondiesel (i.e., gasoline & ethanol blends) vehicles – off network processes (e.g., “starts”).

name: or_lightduty_offnetwork_diesel_c
description: On-road, light duty, diesel vehicles – off network processes (e.g., “starts”).

name: or_heavyduty_offnetwork_gas_conc
description: On-road, heavy duty, nondiesel vehicles – off network processes (e.g., “starts”).

name: or_heavyduty_offnetwork_diesel_c
description: On-road, heavy duty, diesel vehicles – off network processes (e.g., “starts”).

name: or_lightduty_onnetwork_gas_conc
description: On-road, light duty, nondiesel vehicles – on network processes (e.g., running emissions).

name: or_lightduty_onnetwork_diesel_co
description: On-road, light duty, diesel vehicles – on network processes (e.g., running emissions).

name: or_heavyduty_onnetwork_gas_conc
description: On-road, heavy duty, nondiesel vehicles – on- network processes (e.g., “running”).

name: or_heavyduty_onnetwork_diesel_co
description: On-road, heavy duty, diesel vehicles – on- network processes (e.g., “running”).

name: or_refueling_conc
description: On-road refueling.

name: or_heavyduty_hoteling_conc
description: On-road, heavy duty diesel vehicle extended idling and auxiliary power units.

name: nr_recreational_inc_pleasurecraf
description: Off-road motorcycles, snow mobiles, golf carts, outboard pleasure craft, personal watercraft, inboard/sterndrive pleasure craft, etc.

name: nr_construction_conc
description: Paving equipment, plate compactors, trenchers, tampers/rammers, tractors/loaders/backhoes, cranes, signalboards/light plants, etc.

name: nr_commerciallawngarden_conc
description: Mowers, leaf blowers, turf equipment, chippers/ stump grinders, tillers, chainsaws, snow blowers, etc.

name: nr_residentiallawngarden_conc
description: Mowers, leaf blowers, tillers, chainsaws, snow blowers, shredders, etc.

name: nr_agriculture_conc
description: Agricultural tractors, combines, sprayers, balers, tillers, irrigation sets, swathers, etc.

name: nr_commercialequipment_conc
description: Generator sets, pressure washers, pumps, hydropower units, etc.

name: nr_allother_conc
description: Industrial Equipment (Forklifts, sweepers/scrubbers, other oil field equipment), logging equipment, railroadmaintenance, underground mining equipment.

name: nr_cmv_c1c2_conc
description: Commercial marine vessel (CMV) emissions – C1/C2 while at ports.

name: nr_cmv_c3_conc
description: CMV emissions – C3 while at ports.

name: nr_cmv_c1c2c3_underway_conc
description: CMV emissions – both C1/C2 and C3 marine – while underway.

name: nr_locomotives_conc
description: Locomotive emissions.

name: nr_point_airports_conc
description: Point source inventory where facility type = 100 "Airport".

name: nr_point_railyards_conc
description: Point source inventory where facility type = 151 "Rail Yard".

name: np_industrial_conc
description: Nonpoint mining and quarrying, paved and unpaved roads, food and kindred products, mineral products, chemical manufacturing, non-ferrous metals and nonpoint industrial processes not elsewhere classified.

name: np_commercialcooking_conc
description: Commercial cooking (charbroiling, frying).

name: np_oilgas_conc
description: Oil and gas operations (pumps, dehydrators, tanks, engines.

name: np_solventscoatings_conc
description: Degreasing, dry cleaning, consumer and commercial solvents, industrial surface coating, non-industrial surface coating.

name: np_storagetransfer_bulkterminals
description: Bulk terminals, petroleum, organic and inorganic chemical storage and transport – has gas station emissions of only stage 1 (tank refueling) not stage 2 (vehicle refueling).

name: np_miscellaneousnonindustrial_co
description: Poultry/livestock, laboratories, dental alloy, motor vehicle fires, portable fuel containers, residential charcoal grilling.

name: np_fuelcombustion_not_rwc_conc
description: Residential, industrial, commercial and institutional (ICI) fuel combustion, but excludes residential wood combustion.

name: np_residentialwoodcombustionrwc
description: Residential wood combustion – woodstoves, fireplaces.

name: np_wastedisposal_conc
description: Open burning, yard and household waste, managed burning, slash (logging debris), onsite incineration, waste water treatment, composting, landfills, scrap materials.

name: np_agriculturelivestock_conc
description: Emissions from livestock waste (HAPs only).

name: fire_conc
description: CMAQ category only: wildfires, prescribed fires and agricultural burning; while the modeled results are not separated by type of fire, the tabular emissions summary breaks out the three fire types separately.

name: record_date
description: time when record was added.

name: ingestion_timestamp
description: time when record was ingested.
